item.title: Mounjaro Cleared for Type 2 Diabetes in EU Children
item.description: The move broadens treatment choices for pediatric patients aged 10 years and older whose diabetes remains uncontrolled with existing therapies. Medsca...

item.title: Targeted Therapy Nears EU Approval for Obstructive HCM
item.description: Trial results showed improvements in symptoms, exercise capacity, and left ventricular outflow obstruction. Medscape Medical News

item.title: EU Panel Clears Path for Updated Moderna COVID Vaccine
item.description: The decision applies to adolescents and adults and aligns with earlier US authorization for higher-risk groups. Medscape News Europe

item.title: New Biologic Cleared for Severe Asthma and Nasal Polyps
item.description: Phase 3 studies point to sustained disease control in patients who remain symptomatic despite standard therapies. Medscape Medical News
